text: Vikaspedia is an Indian online encyclopedia by Government of India. It was implemented by Centre for Development of Advanced Computing and run by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology of en:Ministry of Communications and Information Technology. {{Infobox website|name=Vikaspedia|logo=|logocaption=|screenshot=|collapsible=|collapsetext=|caption=|url=|commercial=|type=Information and knowledge portal|registration=|language=|num_users=|content_license=|programming language=|owner=Government of India|author=|editor=|launch_date=|revenue=|alexa=|current_status=|footnotes=}} == Language editions == It is have in 23 languages: English, Assamese, Telugu, Hindi, Bengali, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Tamil, Bodo, Dogri, Sanskrit, Kashmiri, Konkani, Nepali, Odia, Urdu, Maithili, Meitei, Santali, Sindhi, Punjabi, and Marathi. == References == Category:Encyclopedias
title: Vikaspedia
